r.s: DataSource driver using PEAR::DB and an SQL query
r.d: This is a DataSource driver for Structures_DataGrid using PEAR::DB and an SQL query.
r.n: - Bug #9342: fix records count for UNION queries (thanks to HarrySchool, HarrySchool at netscape dot net) - small optimizations for streaming support - this package is now licensed under the New BSD license
